item.title: Assemble For Training In 2023
item.description: This is an album of assemble for training in 2023. Start on 27/1/2023, and end on 31/1/2023. The training took place in Taipa Stadium and Lou Hau High School Macao. Except the third day (29/1/2023), took place in Lin Fong Sports Ground and Flora Garden. Last modified at 0:18 1/2/2023. First day (27/1/2023) The first day was surprisingly easy, not tired ğŸ˜„. The longest distance is 200m *4 and

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Here is the first post of my blog. I don’t know how long will it update, so Let nature take its course. I am very excited to create my own website, but it does not public. Emm… Just record the life and some interest.
